lifeless.translation[0].definitions[0].d: dead or appearing to be dead
lifeless.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Anton’s lifeless body was found floating in the lake.
lifeless.translation[0].definitions[1].d: lacking the positive qualities that make something or someone interesting, exciting, or active
lifeless.translation[0].definitions[2].d: not living, or not having living things on it
lifeless.translation[0].definitions[2].e: The surface of the Moon is arid and lifeless.
lifeless.translation[0].definitions[3].d: lifeless hair or skin is in bad condition and does not look healthy
